mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_no, qna_writer, qna_subject, qna_passwd, qna_regdate, qna_readcount, qna_content, qna_re_step, qna_re_level, brddeleteflag)values(nextval('qna_seq'),#{qna_writer},#{qna_subject}, #{qna_passwd},sysdate(),0,#{qna_content},#{qna_re_step},#{qna_re_level},'Y')
mapper.update: update qna set qna_readcount = qna_readcount + 1 where qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.select: select qna_no, qna_subject, qna_content, qna_regdate, qna_writer from qna where brddeleteflag = 'Y' order by qna_no
mapper.update: update qna set qna_reply_content = #{qna_reply_content} where qna_subject = #{qna_subject}
update qna set qna_subject=#{qna_subject}, qna_content=#{qna_content} where qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.delete: delete from qna where qna_no = #{qna_no} and qna_passwd= #{qna_passwd}
mapper.select: select count(*) from qna where qna_writer = #{id}
